snippet: Christmas tree rustlers are at it again in national forests in southern California, rangers say. Poachers have been taking trees without permits at Los Padres, Angeles and San Bernardino national forests, National Forest Service officials said, ad...
lead_paragraph: Christmas tree rustlers are at it again in national forests in southern California, rangers say. Poachers have been taking trees without permits at Los Padres, Angeles and San Bernardino national forests, National Forest Service officials said, adding that tree theft was especially serious in Southern California forests because the relatively few evergreens were already fighting disease, insects and smog.
